text: Itte yaru ga i. `Watashi wa, arra igai no kago o doshite motomerudarou ka. Kare wa ten to ji no sozo-sha de,(subete o) yashinai,(dare karamo) yashinawa renai' itte yaru ga i. `Watashi wa (kare ni) fukuju, kie suru mono no sakiki kake to nari,“tashinkyo to no nakama to natte wa naranai” to meiji rareta
